org.eclipse.golo.compiler

Class PackageAndClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.golo.compiler.PackageAndClass

  • public final class PackageAndClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a package and class.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static PackageAndClass of(java.lang.Object o)
        Creates a PackageAndClass. Extracts the name from the given object.
        Parameters:
        o - a String, PackageAndClass, Class, GoloType or GoloModule instance.

      • createInnerClass

        public PackageAndClass createInnerClass(java.lang.String name)
        Create an inner class.

        For instance: 

        
 PackageAndClass cls = new PackageAndClass("foo.bar", "Spam");
 PackageAndClass inner = cls.createInnerClass("Egg"); // foo.bar.Spam$Egg
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the inner class.
        Returns:
        a new PackageAndClass identifying an inner class of this class.

      • createSiblingClass

        public PackageAndClass createSiblingClass(java.lang.String name)
        Create a sibling class.

        For instance: 

        
  PackageAndClass list = new PackageAndClass("java.util", "List");
  PackageAndClass set = list.createSiblingClass("Set"); // java.util.Set
        Returns:
        a new PackageAndClass identifying an alternate class in the same package.

      • createSubPackage

        public PackageAndClass createSubPackage(java.lang.String name)
        Create a sub-package.

        For instance: 

        
  PackageAndClass pc = new PackageAndClass("foo.bar", "Module");
  PackageAndClass sub = pc.createSubPackage("types"); // foo.bar.Modules.types
        Returns:
        a new PackageAndClass identifying a sub-package of this package.

      • inPackage

        public PackageAndClass inPackage(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Create a class in another package.

        For instance: 

        
 PackageAndClass pc = PackageAndClass.fromString("foo.bar.Baz");
 PackageAndClass other = pc.inPackage("plic.ploc"); // plic.ploc.Baz
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the qualified name of the new package.
        Returns:
        a new PackageAndClass representing the same class in another package.

      • inPackage

        public PackageAndClass inPackage(PackageAndClass parent)
        Create a class in the same package as another one.

        For instance: 

        
 PackageAndClass pc = PackageAndClass.fromString("foo.bar.Baz");
 PackageAndClass other = PackageAndClass.fromString("plic.ploc.Foo");
 PackageAndClass newOne = pc.inPackage(other); // plic.ploc.Baz
        Parameters:
        parent - the PackageAndClass representing the new package.
        Returns:
        a new PackageAndClass representing the same class in another package.

      • packageName

        public java.lang.String packageName()
        Returns:
        the package name.

        public boolean hasPackage()
        Check if this PackageAndClass has a package component.
